```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

N = 0 
S = 0

for (i in 1:1000){
  x <- rnorm(100)
  e <- rnorm(100, 0, 2) 
  y <- 0.5 + 0*x +e
  xy.lm <- lm(y~x)
  pvalue = summary(xy.lm)$coefficient[2, 4]
  if(0.05>=pvalue){
    S = S+1
  }
  N = N + 1
  
}
S/N
1+1 
```
